addresses.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'e911_address' || doc.deleted_by_user || doc.pvt_deleted) return; if (doc._attachments) {var att = 'true'} else {var att = 'false'}; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'zip': doc.zip, 'city': doc.city, 'state': doc.state, 'address': doc.address_line1 + ' ' + doc.address_line2 + ' ' + doc.address_line3, 'address_confirmed': doc.pvt_address_confirmed, 'attachment': att}); }

addresses_all.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'e911_address' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; if (doc._attachments) {var att = 'true'} else {var att = 'false'}; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'zip': doc.zip, 'city': doc.city, 'state': doc.state, 'address': doc.address_line1 + ' ' + doc.address_line2 + ' ' + doc.address_line3, 'address_confirmed': doc.pvt_address_confirmed, 'attachment': att}); }
